# Moon (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |

| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Eilistraee, Hathor, Malar, Sehanine Moonbow, Sel√ªne, Sharindlar |

**Granted Powers:** Turn or destroy lycanthropes as a good cleric turns or destroys undead. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Cha modifier.

**Moon Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Faerie Fire (Spell)|Faerie Fire]]****:** Outlines subject with light, canceling *[[Blur (Spell)|blur]]**,* concealment, and the like.

**2 [[Moonbeam (Spell)|Moonbeam]]:** Forces lycanthropes to regain human shape.

**3 [[Moon Blade (Spell)|Moon Blade]]:** Creates sword that does 2d8 damage +1/two level, scrambles magic.

**4** **[[Fear (Spell)|Fear]]****:** Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

**5 [[Moon Path (Spell)|Moon Path]]:** Creates invisible stair or bridge.

**6** **[[Permanent Image (Spell)|Permanent Image]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Includes sight, sound, and smell.

**7** **[[Insanity (Spell)|Insanity]]****:** Subject suffers continuous *[[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]]**.*

**8** **[[Animal Shapes (Spell)|Animal Shapes]]****:** One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

**9 [[Moonfire (Spell)|Moonfire]]:** Cone of light damages creatures, reveals hidden things, negates electricity damage.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 277 |

| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 88 |
